name: Icarus Escape
description:
Avoid the birds and pillars, and coins boost your score +100. 

Programming, and a good amount of sprites, a good amount of songs/soundeffects, all around CEO of the project  - Ganesh

A serious amount of sprites - Sameer

Icarus animation/sprite - Jack Roberts

Technological Support for Art, also a good amount of sprites, and promo paragraph - Charles

Technological Support for Music, a good amount of songs/sound effects spliced and edited - Aariz
